resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73815</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73815</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>8126f8ec-de4c-43bc-a323-edc4d34b784b#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A véralvadás mikroszkópos felvételen</string>
            <string language="en">Blood clotting on microscopic shot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blut, das auf mikroskopischem Schuß gerinnt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sang coagulant sur le projectile microscopique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sangue que clotting no tiro microscópico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anima che si coagula sul colpo microscopico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αίμα που σβολιάζει στο μικροσκοπικό πλάνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sangre que coagula en tiro microscópico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A véralvadás eredményeként létrejött fibrinháló pásztázó elektronmikroszkópos felvételen</string>
            <string language="en">The fibrin reticulum originated as a result of blood clotting, on scanner electron microscopic shot</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">keringés,  vér,  véralvadás,  vérlemezke,  </string>
            <string language="en">circulation, blood, blood clotting, blood plaque</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Fibrinnetzmagen entstand resultierend aus 
gerinnenden Blut, dem auf elektronenmikroskopischem Schuß des 
Scanners</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le bonnet de fibrine lancé en raison du sang 
coagulant, sur le projectile à microscope électronique de module de 
balayage</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O reticulum do fibrin originou em conseqüência 
do sangue que clotting, no tiro microscópico do elétron do varredor</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il reticolo del fibrin prodotto come conseguenza 
di anima che si coagula, sul colpo al microscopio elettronico del 
dispositivo d'esplorazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Reticulum φιβρίνης που δημιουργείται ως αποτέλεσμα 
του αίματος που σβολιάζει, στο μικροσκοπικό πλάνο ηλεκτρονίων 
σαρωτών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El retículo del fibrin originó como resultado 
de la sangre que coagulaba, en tiro microscópico del electrón del 
explorador</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zirkulation, Blut, gerinnendes Blut, Blutplakette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">circulation, sang, sang coagulant, plaque de sang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">circulação, sangue, sangue que clotting, chapa do 
sangue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">circolazione, anima, anima che si coagula, piastra di 
anima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυκλοφορία, αίμα, αίμα που σβολιάζει, πινακίδα αίματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">circulación, sangre, sangre que coagula, placa de la 
sangre</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73815</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=8126f8ec-de4c-43bc-a323-edc4d34b784b&v=1&b=1</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
